SA15bsa066_u:4_0: ityādāveva ślokaḥ / āhāsya kimādāvupanyāsa iti / ucyate / iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato 'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:4_1: śāstrārthakathanakālopasthitaparasaṃbhāvyamānānupanyāsahetunirākaraṇārthaṃ ca nyāyapraveśakākhyaṃ śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:4_3: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat /
SA15bsa066_u:4_5: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena /
SA15bsa066_u:4_6: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:5_1: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ //
SA15bsa066_u:8_0: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni /
SA15bsa066_u:9_0: adhunā padārtha ucyate / sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:9_1: tacca pakṣādivacanajātam / vakṣyati ca / pakṣādivacanāni sādhanam / viṣayaścāsya dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī /
SA15bsa066_u:13_0: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham / ucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:14_0: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:14_1: caśabdaḥ samuccaye / evakāro 'vadhāraṇe / sa cānyayogavyavacchedārtha ityetaddarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:14_2: tathā ābhāsanamābhāsaḥ / saha ābhāsena vartate sābhāsam /
SA15bsa066_u:15_2: vakṣyati ca / sādhayitumiṣṭo 'pi pratyakṣādiviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsa ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:16_1: / parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:16_2: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya /
SA15bsa066_u:16_3: iyaṃ tādarthye caturthī / yathā yūpāya dāruḥ / iti padārthaḥ // vākyarthastvayam / sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:17_0: parasaṃvitphalatvāttayoḥ / yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko 'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti /
SA15bsa066_u:17_1: / pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:17_2: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:17_3: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:18_2: caśabdaḥ pūrvavat / sābhāsam ityādi / vakṣyati ca kalpanājñānamarthāntare pratyakṣābhāsam ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:18_4: tu śabdastvevakārārthaḥ / sa cāvadhāraṇa iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:18_5: / ātmasaṃvide iti / atatītyātmā jīvaḥ / saṃvedanaṃ saṃvit / ātmanaḥ saṃvit ātmasaṃvit / tasyai ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya /
SA15bsa066_u:18_6: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā /
SA15bsa066_u:19_0: tatpratipādakapramāṇābhāvāt / iti padārthaḥ // vākyārthastvayam / pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:19_1: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto 'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:19_5: ucyate / satyapi tatpuraḥsaratve śāstrārambhasya parasaṃvitpradhānatvātsādhanadūṣaṇayorapi tatphalatvātpratyāsatterādāvupanyāsaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:20_0: kṛtaṃ prasaṅgena / prakṛtaṃ prastumaḥ // iha ca sādhanādayo 'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:22_2: / aparastvāha / idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam /
SA15bsa066_u:25_2: arya(rthya)ta ityarthaḥ / śāstrasyārthaḥ śāstrārthaḥ / tasya sagrahaḥ śāstrārthasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:26_0: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha /
SA15bsa066_u:26_2: tatraśabdo nirdhāraṇārthaḥ / tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:26_4: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti /
SA15bsa066_u:26_6: / pacyate iti pakṣaḥ / paca vyaktīkaraṇe / pacyate vyaktīkriyate yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:26_7: sādhya ityarthaḥ / sa ca dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī / pakṣa ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:27_6: na parvataḥ kṣetraguṇaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / upalakṣaṇamātramiti bhāvanā /
SA15bsa066_u:28_2: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:28_4: asya cāyamarthaḥ / ādīyate 'smādityādiḥ yathā parvatādikaṃ kṣetramityādau /
SA15bsa066_u:28_5: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti /
SA15bsa066_u:28_6: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:29_0: iha ca yadā sādhyate 'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:29_2: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:29_4: kārye kāraṇopacārāt / yathedaṃ me śarīraṃ paurāṇāṃ karmeti /
SA15bsa066_u:29_5: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti /
SA15bsa066_u:29_10: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:30_1: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam /
SA15bsa066_u:30_7: / asya gamanikā / pacyate iti pakṣaḥ / hinotīti hetuḥ / hi gatau / sarve gatyarthāḥ jñānārthāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:32_1: āha / ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto 'rtha iti /
SA15bsa066_u:32_4: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:33_1: vyatireke bījādi // tatra pakṣādivacanāni sādhanam ityuiktam /
SA15bsa066_u:33_4: asya gamanikā / tatraśabdo nirdhāraṇārthaḥ / nirdhāraṇaṃ ca prasiddhadharmitvādiguṇato 'vaseyamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:33_5: pakṣa iti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ / dharmīti / dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste 'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_2: atrāha / iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate /
SA15bsa066_u:34_4: naitadevam / samyagarthānavabodhāt / iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau /
SA15bsa066_u:34_7: / sādhyatvenepsita iti / sādhanīyaḥ sādhayitavyaḥ sādhanamarhatīti vā sādhyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_8: tasya bhāvaḥ sādhyatvama / tena sādhyatvena / īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_9: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_10: prasiddhaviśepaṇaviśiṣṭayetyanena tvaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya ubhayena cāprasiddhobhayasya svayamityanena cābhyupagamasiddhāntaparigraheṇa sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇasiddhāntānāṃ vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_13: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pi yastadānena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti yaduktaṃ vādimukhyena tadapi saṃgatameva /
SA15bsa066_u:34_17: icchayāpi vyāptaḥ pakṣaḥ / ityetacca parārthāścakṣurādaya ityatra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:34_18: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa066_u:34_19: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:35_0: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha /
SA15bsa066_u:36_2: sa ca trirūpaḥ / trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:36_3: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam /
SA15bsa066_u:36_4: kimiti paripraśne / punariti vitarke / trirūpasya bhāvastrairūpyam /
SA15bsa066_u:36_5: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva /
SA15bsa066_u:36_6: asya gamanikā / uktalakṣaṇaḥ pakṣatasya dharmaḥ pakṣadharmastadbhāvaḥ pakṣadharmatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:36_8: avayave samudāyopacārāt / idamekaṃ rūpam / tathā sapakṣe sattvam / sapakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ / tasminsattvamastitvaṃ sāmānyena bhāva ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:36_9: idaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam / tathā vipakṣe cāsattvamiti tṛtīyaṃ rūpam /
SA15bsa066_u:36_11: caśabdaḥ punaḥśabdārthaḥ / sa ca viśeṣārtha iti darśitameva /
SA15bsa066_u:37_1: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa066_u:37_2: / sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati /
SA15bsa066_u:37_3: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti /
SA15bsa066_u:37_8: anityatvādiḥ / samānaḥ sadṛśastasya bhāvaḥ sāmānyaṃ tulyatā /
SA15bsa066_u:37_13: artho ghaṭādiḥ / na tu vacanamātram / samānaḥ pakṣaṃ sapakṣa iti / athavā upacāravṛttyā dharmiṇi sādhyatvamadhikriyate /
SA15bsa066_u:38_1: śeṣaṃ pūrvavat / anupacaritaṃ tu sādhyam / dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmīti bhāvārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:38_5: anitye śabde sādhye kim? / ghaṭādiranityaḥ padārthasaṃghātaḥ sapakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:38_8: visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣaḥ / sa kīdṛgiti svarūpato darśayati /
SA15bsa066_u:38_9: yatra yasminnarthe / sādhanīyaṃ sādhyam / nāsti na vidyate / iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate /
SA15bsa066_u:38_10: udāharaṇaṃ darśayati / yathā yannityamityādi / tatra yannityamiti kimuktaṃ bhavati? /
SA15bsa066_u:38_15: tatra kṛtakatvamityādi / tatreti pūrvavat / kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:38_16: tatra kriyate iti kṛtakaḥ / apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
SA15bsa066_u:38_19: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_0: vāśabdaḥ caśabdārthaḥ / sa ca samuccaye / dvitīyahetvabhidhānaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_3: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_7: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_8: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_9: āha / yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe 'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_11: āha / yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham? /
SA15bsa066_u:39_12: ucyate / prayogopadarśanārtham / uktaṃ ca / anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:39_16: dṛṣṭānta ityādi / dṛṣṭaṃ tatrārthaṃ antaṃ nayatīti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_18: sa ca dvividhaḥ / dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam /
SA15bsa066_u:39_20: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:39_21: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena /
SA15bsa066_u:39_22: caśabdaḥ samuccaye / tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaditi / tāvacchabdaḥ kramārthaḥ / yatreti / abhidheyahetoruktalakṣaṇasya sapakṣa evāstitvaṃ khyāpyate /
SA15bsa066_u:39_23: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena /
SA15bsa066_u:39_24: taccedam / yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam /
SA15bsa066_u:39_26: vaidharmyeṇāpi / yatra sādhyābhāve hetorabhāva eva kathyate /
SA15bsa066_u:39_27: yatretyabhidheye / sādhyaṃ anityatvādi tasyābhāve hetoḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_28: kim? / abhāva eva kathyate pratipādyate vacanena /
SA15bsa066_u:39_31: āha / na saugatānāṃ nityaṃ nāma kiṃcidasti /
SA15bsa066_u:39_36: anityo na bhavatīti nityaḥ / akṛtakaśabdenāpi kṛtakatvasyābhāvaḥ ucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:39_37: iti ca vartate / kṛtakau na bhavatītyakṛtakaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_39: atraivodāharaṇamāha / yathā bhāvābhāvo 'bhāvaḥ / yathetyaupamye / bhāvaḥ sattā tasyābhāvo bhāvābhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:39_40: asāvabhāva ucyate / na tu bhāvādanyo 'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo 'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike 'pi bhāvitameva /
SA15bsa066_u:40_2: vacanāni ye vācakāḥ śabdāḥ / kim? / parapratyāyanakāle prāsnikapratyāyanakāle sādhanam /
SA15bsa066_u:40_3: yathā prayogato darśayati / yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pakṣavacanam /
SA15bsa066_u:40_5: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam /
SA15bsa066_u:40_7: iti nigadasiddham / yāvat etānyeva trayo 'vayavā ityucyante /
SA15bsa066_u:40_9: traya iti saṃkhyā / avayavā ityucyante / pūrvācāryāṇāṃ saṃjñāntarametat /
SA15bsa066_u:41_0: uktaṃ sādhanam / adhunā tadābhāsa ucyate / tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:41_4: kim? / pratyakṣādiviruddhaḥ / virudhyate sa viruddhaḥ / pratyakṣādayo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāstairviruddho nirākṛtaḥ pratyakṣādiviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:41_5: kim? / pakṣābhāsaḥ / tasyātroktalakṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ ābhāsanamābhāsaḥ ākāramātram /
SA15bsa066_u:41_10: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt /
SA15bsa066_u:42_4: atra śabdo dharmī / aśrāvaṇatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ / ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:42_5: āha / śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_7: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:42_9: / anumānaviruddho yathā / nityo ghaṭa iti / atra ghaṭo dharmī / nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ / sa cānumānaprasiddhenānityatvena tatraiva dharmiṇi bādhyate /
SA15bsa066_u:42_10: anumānaṃ cedam / anityo ghaṭaḥ kāraṇādhīnātmalābhatvāt pradipavat /
SA15bsa066_u:42_11: / āgamaviruddho yathā / vaiśeṣikasya nityaḥ śabda iti sādhayataḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:42_12: vaiśeṣiko 'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:42_14: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:42_15: / lokaviruddho yathā / śuci naraśiraḥkapālaṃ prāṇyaṅgatvāt śaṅkhaśuktivat iti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_17: śucitvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ / sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_21: / svavacanaviruddho yathā / mātā me vandhyā iti / iha ca mātā sādhyadharmitvenopāttā /
SA15bsa066_u:42_22: vandhyeti ca sādhyadharmaḥ / sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate /
SA15bsa066_u:42_23: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā /
SA15bsa066_u:42_24: tataśca yadi mātā kathaṃ vandhyā? vandhyā cetkathaṃ māteti? /
SA15bsa066_u:42_26: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_27: na prasiddhamaprasiddham / viśiṣyate aneneti viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:42_30: atra ca śabda iti nirdeśaḥ / vināśīti sādhyadharmaḥ / ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:42_34: 13 vyāsabhāṣya] / āha / yadyevaṃ na kaścitpakṣābhāso nāmāsti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_39: nānyathā / punaḥ sādhanāpekṣatvāt / ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_40: aprasādhite tu pakṣābhāsaḥ / iti kṛta prasaṅgena // tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti /
SA15bsa066_u:42_42: iha cātmā dharmī / cetanatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ / iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_2: ubhayaṃ dharmadharmiṇau / tatrātmā dharmī / sukhādisamavāyikāraṇatvaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_5: tathāhi- tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:43_10: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
SA15bsa066_u:43_12: ākṣepaparihārau pūrvavat // tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa066_u:43_13: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_16: eṣāṃ vacanāni ityādi / eṣāmiti navānāmapi paramārśaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_21: pratiṣedhanamityarthaḥ / dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_31: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:43_32: ca samuccaye / tataśca eṣāṃ vacanāni / pratijñādoṣāḥ / pratijñāpakṣa ityanarthāntaram /
SA15bsa066_u:44_5: tatrāsiddhaścatuḥprakāraḥ / tatra eṣu asiddhādiṣu / asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:44_6: catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ / prakārāndarśayati / tadyathā / ubhayāsiddha ityādi / tadyatheti pūrvavat / ubhayorvādiprativādinoḥ asiddha ubhayāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:44_7: / anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:44_11: / idānīmudāharaṇānyāha / tatra śabdānityatve ityādi / tatreti pūrvavat / śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi /
SA15bsa066_u:45_2: tathāhi- cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:45_5: śabdanityatve sādhye iti / vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:45_6: tathāhi- na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti /
SA15bsa066_u:45_7: / tathā bāṣpādibhāvenetyādi / bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena /
SA15bsa066_u:45_8: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:45_12: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti /
SA15bsa066_u:45_13: tathā dravyamākāśamityādi / ākāśa iti dharminirdeśaḥ / dravyamiti sādhyo dharmaḥ / guṇāścāsya ṣaṭ / tadyathā / saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti /
SA15bsa066_u:46_2: dharmiṇa evāsiddhatvāt / tathā ca tasyāyaṃ siddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:46_3: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram /
SA15bsa066_u:46_4: katamāni pañca / atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti /
SA15bsa066_u:46_5: nanu cānyo 'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā /
SA15bsa066_u:46_8: sa kasmānnoktaḥ / ācārya āha / antarbhāvāt / kva punarantarbhāva iti cait ubhayāsiddhe /
SA15bsa066_u:48_5: ekānte bhava aikāntikaḥ / na aikāntikau 'naikāntikaḥ / ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:48_6: / bhedānevāha / sādhāraṇa ityādi / anvartham / ityudāharaṇameva vakṣyāmaḥ / tatra sādhāraṇaḥ prabheyatvānnitya iti /
SA15bsa066_u:48_7: tatreti pūrvavat / dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:48_8: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:48_11: āha ca / taddhi nityānityetyādi / tat prameyatvaṃ dharmaḥ / hi rūpapradarśane / nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau /
SA15bsa066_u:48_14: prayoga eva darśayati / kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati /
SA15bsa066_u:48_15: aho nāyaṃ saṃśayahetuḥ / etatprayogamantareṇa prāgeva saṃśayasya bhāvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:50_4: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:50_5: udāharaṇamāha / śrāvaṇatvānnitya iti / śravaṇendriyagrāhyaḥ śrāvaṇastadbhāvaḥ śrāvaṇatvaṃ tasmāt /
SA15bsa066_u:50_6: nityaḥ avināśī / śabda iti gamyate / tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam /
SA15bsa066_u:50_7: ata evāha / taddhītyādi / tat śrāvaṇatvam / hi rūpapradarśane nityānityapakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛttatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:50_8: saṃśayaheturiti yogaḥ / anyatra vartiṣyata itīdamapi nirākurvannāha /
SA15bsa066_u:50_10: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:50_14: yadi tadanyatra nitye vānitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:50_16: ityatra bahu vaktavyam / alaṃ prasaṅgena / ākṣepaparihārau pūrvavat / evaṃ śeṣeṣvapi bhāvanīyamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:50_17: / sapakṣaikadeśavṛttirityādi / samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:50_18: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī /
SA15bsa066_u:51_1: samāsaḥ sukara eva / udāharaṇamāha / yathā prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:51_6: nākāśādau / tasmādetadapi vidyudghaṭasādharmyeṇa pūrvavadanaikāntikam iti sūtrārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:51_18: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:51_20: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:51_25: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha /
SA15bsa066_u:51_27: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:51_28: ubhayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāditi / ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā /
SA15bsa066_u:51_29: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti /
SA15bsa066_u:51_30: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_2: atha vyastayostadapi na / vyastayoḥ samyagdhetutvāt / atrocyate / samastayoreva saṃdehahetutvam /
SA15bsa066_u:52_4: tanna / yato bhidyata eva / parasparasāpekṣo viruddhāvyabhicārī ceti /
SA15bsa066_u:52_5: ekakaḥ asahāyo 'sādhāraṇaḥ / sa cānenāṃśenācāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_8: atra bahu vaktavyam / tattu nocyate / saṃkṣeparucisattvānugrahārtho 'yamārambhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_10: virudhyate sa viruddhaḥ / tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_14: tatra dharmetyādi / tatra dharmasvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā nityeti pūrvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:52_16: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_18: adhunodāharaṇamāha / yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_21: tenaivāvinābhūtatvāt / tathā cāha / vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:52_22: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti? /
SA15bsa066_u:52_23: atrocyate / nāvaśyaṃ pakṣadharma eva viruddhatā anyathāpyācāryapravṛtteḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:53_4: ityalaṃ prasaṅgena / gamanikāmātrametat / dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti /
SA15bsa066_u:53_5: kaḥ punarevamāha? / sāṃkhyo bauddhaṃ prati / iha cakṣurādayo dharmiṇaḥ / ādiśabdāt śeṣendiyamahadahaṃṅkārādiparigrahaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:53_8: saṃghātatvāditi hetuḥ / tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:53_10: śayanaṃ palyaṅkādi / āsanamāsandakādi / tadaṅgāni pratītānyeva / yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo 'pīti bhāvārthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:54_0: ayamityādi / ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:54_1: tenāpyavinābhūtatvāt / tathā cāha / ubhayatrāvyabhicārāt / ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:54_2: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi /
SA15bsa066_u:54_3: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya /
SA15bsa066_u:54_4: tathopalabdheriti / āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:54_5: ucyate / asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt /
SA15bsa066_u:54_6: kiṃ nopapadyate? / ākṣepaparihārau pūrvavat // dharmisvarūpaviparītetyādi / dharmā asya vidyante iti dharmī /
SA15bsa066_u:54_8: kaḥ punarevamāha? / vaiśeṣiko bauddhānprati / kena punaḥ saṃbandhena? iti /
SA15bsa066_u:55_0: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi /
SA15bsa066_u:55_1: guṇāścaturviśatiḥ / rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:55_2: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti /
SA15bsa066_u:55_3: evaṃ caturviśati rguṇāḥ / pañca karmāṇi / tadyathā utkṣepaṇamavakṣepaṇamākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ gamanamiti karmāṇi /
SA15bsa066_u:55_6: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate /
SA15bsa066_u:55_11: adhunā bhāvārtha ucyate / na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ / dravyādanya ityarthaḥ / ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān /
SA15bsa066_u:56_3: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam /
SA15bsa066_u:56_7: ekadravyavāṃśca bhāvaḥ / ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:56_9: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:56_11: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat /
SA15bsa066_u:56_12: dravyatvavadityarthaḥ / tataścaitadukte bhavati / yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo 'pītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:56_13: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathāpi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha /
SA15bsa066_u:56_14: guṇakarmasu ca bhāvāt / tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:56_15: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām /
SA15bsa066_u:56_16: vartate ca guṇeṣu bhāvaḥ / san guṇa iti pratīteḥ / tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:56_17: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām /
SA15bsa066_u:56_18: vartate ca karmasu bhāvaḥ / satkarmeti pratīteḥ / vyatyayopanyāsastu pratijñāhetvorvicitranyāyapradarśanārtham /
SA15bsa066_u:56_20: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro 'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:57_0: tenāpyavinābhūtatvāt / tathā cāha / ubhayatrāvyabhicārāt / ubhayatra dravyādipratiṣedhe bhāvābhāve ca gamakatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:57_1: tathā ca / yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:57_3: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:57_4: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:57_6: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:57_9: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ? /
SA15bsa066_u:57_10: tathāhi / na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām /
SA15bsa066_u:57_12: atrocyate satyametat / kiṃtu paraprasiddho 'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:57_16: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā /
SA15bsa066_u:58_1: atra bahu vaktavyam / alaṃ prasaṅgena // dharmiviśeṣaviparītasādhano yathā /
SA15bsa066_u:58_3: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā /
SA15bsa066_u:58_4: tadviparītasādhano yathā / ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati /
SA15bsa066_u:58_5: tenāpi vyāpyatvāt / tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat /
SA15bsa066_u:59_1: te ucyante / tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa066_u:59_2: āha / dṛṣṭāntābhaso dvividhaḥ / sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca /
SA15bsa066_u:59_5: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā /
SA15bsa066_u:59_9: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvāsiddhasādhanadharmā iti /
SA15bsa066_u:59_11: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:59_14: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate /
SA15bsa066_u:60_0: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:60_5: tathā cāha / paramāṇau hi sādhyaṃ nityatvamasti /
SA15bsa066_u:60_7: kutaḥ / mūrtatvāt paramāṇunām / mūrtatvaṃ ca mūrtimatkāryaghaṭādyupalabdheḥ siddhamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:60_9: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:60_10: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva /
SA15bsa066_u:60_11: vyāptiṃ darśayati / yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:60_15: kutaḥ? / anityatvādbuddheriti // ubhayāsiddho dvividhaḥ / katham? ityatrāha / sannasaṃśceti / sanniti vidyamānobhayāsiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:60_19: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo 'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti /
SA15bsa066_u:61_5: lakṣaṇamāha / yatretyādi / yatretyabhidheyamāha / vinānvayena vinā vyāptidarśanena sādhyasādhanayoḥ sādhyahetvorityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:61_8: udāharaṇamāha / yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:61_11: viparītānvaya ityādi / viparīto viparyayavṛttiranvayo 'nugamo yasmin tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:61_12: udāharaṇamāha / yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:61_14: āha / evamapi ko doṣaḥ? iti / ucyate / nyāyamudrāvyatikramaḥ / anyatra vyāptivyabhicārāt / yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam /
SA15bsa066_u:61_17: / vaidharmyeṇāpi / na kevalaṃ sādharmyeṇaiva / kim? / dṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ / prāṅnirūpitaśabdārthaḥ / pañcaprakāraḥ / tadyathā sādhyāvyāvṛtta ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:61_21: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eva // tatra sādhyāvyāvṛttaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvātparamāṇuvat /
SA15bsa066_u:61_23: nityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā / amūrtatvāditi hetuḥ / vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāsasya prakrāntatvātsādharmyadṛṣṭānto noktaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:62_2: yata uktam / sādhyābhāve hetorabhāva eva kathyate ityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:62_3: na cāyaṃ tathetyāha ca / paramāṇorhi sakāśāt / sādhanadharmo hetuḥ / tameva darśayati amūrtatvamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:62_4: vyāvṛttaṃ nivṛttam / kutaḥ? / mūrtatvātparamāṇunām / sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ tanna vyāvṛttam /
SA15bsa066_u:62_5: kutaḥ? / nityatvātparamāṇūnām / āha / sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate? /
SA15bsa066_u:62_7: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti /
SA15bsa066_u:63_0: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntastu karma / tacca utkṣepaṇādi gṛhyate / tatra karmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttam /
SA15bsa066_u:63_1: anityatvātkarmaṇaḥ / sādhanadharmo hetuḥ / tameva darśayati amūrtatvamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:63_2: tanna vyāvṛttam / amūrtatvātkarmaṇa iti // ubhayāvyāvṛttaḥākāśavaditi / nityatvasādhakaḥ prayogaḥ paramāṇvādisādharmyadṛṣṭāntayuktaḥ pūrvavat /
SA15bsa066_u:63_4: tato hi ākāśāt / na nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ nāpyamūrtatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:63_6: / avyatireka ityādi / avidyamānavyātirekaḥ avyatirekaḥ anidarśitavyatireka ityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:63_7: lakṣaṇamāha / yatra vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā tadvipakṣabhāvo nidarśyate /
SA15bsa066_u:63_8: yatretyabhidheyamāha / vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā /
SA15bsa066_u:63_11: dṛṣṭāntamāha / yathā ghaṭe 'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:64_1: / viparitavyatireka ityādi / viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:64_2: tameva darśayati / yadanityamityādi / prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
SA15bsa066_u:64_3: āha / evamapi ko doṣaḥ? iti / ucyate / anyatra vyabhicāraḥ / tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:65_1: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe /
SA15bsa066_u:65_6: ca samuccaye / dve eva pramāṇe ityanena saṃkhyāniyamamāha /
SA15bsa066_u:65_7: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne /
SA15bsa066_u:65_11: tatra pratyakṣamityādi / tatreti nirdhāraṇārthaḥ / pratyakṣamiti lakṣyanirdeśaḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:65_14: kalpanāpoḍhamiti / kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham /
SA15bsa066_u:65_17: yat iti tatsvarūpanirdeśaḥ / evaṃbhūtaṃ cārthe svalakṣaṇamapi bhavati /
SA15bsa066_u:65_18: āha / jñānaṃ saṃvedanam / tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye /
SA15bsa066_u:65_21: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam /
SA15bsa066_u:65_26: kriyākalpanā pācaka iti / dravyakalpanā daṇḍīti / ābhiḥ kalpanābhī rahitaṃ śabdarahitam /
SA15bsa066_u:65_27: svalakṣaṇahetutvāt / uktaṃ ca / na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi /
SA15bsa066_u:66_1: āha / yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
SA15bsa066_u:66_5: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
SA15bsa066_u:67_1: āha / manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya /
SA15bsa066_u:67_2: ucyate / kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yattajjñānarthe rūpādau ityanenārthasākṣātkāritvagrahaṇānmanovijñānaderapi tadavyabhicārātsaṃgṛhītameva tanmānasam /
SA15bsa066_u:67_4: iti kṛtaṃ prasaṅgeṇa / gamanikāmātrametat // anumānamityādi / anumitiramumānam / tacca liṅgādarthadarśanamāliṅgaṃ punastrirūpamuktam /
SA15bsa066_u:67_5: pakṣadharmatvādi / tasmātrirūpālliṅgādyadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānamutpadyate kiṃviśiṣṭam? agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
SA15bsa066_u:67_7: adhunā phalamāha / ubhayatretyādi / ubhatra pratyekṣe 'numāne ca /
SA15bsa066_u:67_9: phalaṃ kāryam / kutaḥ? / adhigamarūpatvāt / adhigamaḥ paricchedastadrūpatvāt /
SA15bsa066_u:67_12: bhinnādhikaraṇatvāt / ityatra bahu vaktavyam alaṃ prasaṅgena /
SA15bsa066_u:68_1: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram /
SA15bsa066_u:68_2: pramāṇamiti gamyate / savyāpāramasyā vidyata iti savyāpāravatī /
SA15bsa066_u:68_3: khyātiriti gamyate / savyāpāravatī cāsau khyātiśca savyāpāravatkhyātiḥ pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa066_u:68_5: etaduktaṃ bhavati / viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti /
SA15bsa066_u:68_6: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
SA15bsa066_u:68_7: so 'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate /
SA15bsa066_u:68_8: ityukte pratyakṣānumāne // adhunā pratyekṣābhāsamāha / kalpanājñānamarthāntare pratyakṣābhāsam /
SA15bsa066_u:68_10: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
SA15bsa066_u:69_1: vyabhicārāt / etadeva vyācaṣṭe / hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
SA15bsa066_u:69_2: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam /
SA15bsa066_u:69_8: etānyeva daśayīrta / sādhanadoṣo nyūnatvam / sāmānyena viśeṣamāha / pakṣadoṣaḥ pratyakṣadiviruddhatvam /
SA15bsa066_u:69_12: tasyodbhāvanamiti / tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
SA15bsa066_u:69_14: uktaṃ dūṣaṇam // adhunā dūṣāṇābhāsamāha / abhūtasādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇābhāsāni /
SA15bsa066_u:69_15: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni /
SA15bsa066_u:69_16: etadeva darśayati / saṃpūrṇe sādhane avayave nyūnatvavacanam /
SA15bsa066_u:69_17: nyūnamidamityevaṃbhūtam / aduṣṭapakṣe pakṣa doṣavacanam ityādi nigadasiddham /
SA15bsa066_u:70_2: ākhyātaṃ kathitam / ādau prathamam / diṅmātrasiddhaye nyāyadiṅmātrasiddhayartham /
